text:
Mynagappally is a village in Kollam district, Kerala, India.
Politics.
The village is under the leadership of LDF Party. The Mynagappally Panchayath President is Smt P K Jayalekshmi. The Vice President is Sri.Reghunathan pillai
Transport.
Sasthamcotta railway station is in this village.
Economy.
The major jobs are regarding to cashew factories, brick manufacturing, tile manufacturing, coir industry and matchbox industry.
